mapper.sql: id AS "id", use_task AS "useTask", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", m_number AS "mNumber", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_cabinet2_input_scrap where 1 = 1
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_input_scrap where 1 = 1
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')

SELECT wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.id AS "id", wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.use_task AS "useTask", wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.m_number AS "mNumber", wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.operation_time AS "operationTime", wms_cabinet2_use_task.task_number AS "taskNumber", wms_material_type.material_type AS "materialType", wms_material_type.material_name AS "materialName", wms_material_type.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_material_type.sizes as "sizes", wms_cabinet2_use_task.operator as "operators", wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.operator as "operator" FROM wms_cabinet2_input_scrap LEFT JOIN wms_cabinet2_use_task on wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.use_task=wms_cabinet2_use_task.id LEFT JOIN wms_material_type on wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.material_type_id=wms_material_type.id where 1 = 1
and wms_cabinet2_input_scrap.operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_use_task.task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_use_task.operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operators},'%')
and wms_material_type.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wms_material_type.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_material_type.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_input_scrap where 1 = 1
and operator like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.operator},'%')
